get.description: Detect if a visitor's location has events/venues (populated area) vs none (unpopulated area). Used for frontend entry flow to show different welcome messages. Returns event count, venue count, and nearest venue information within a specified radius.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude of the location to check

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: Longitude of the location to check

unpopulated_area.summary: Unpopulated area - no events or venues (Chicago)

pre_launch_area.summary: Pre-launch area with venues but no events (Austin)

value.error: lat and lng are required and must be valid numbers
lat must be between -90 and 90, lng must be between -180 and 180
